member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES
member.summary: Specifies the states that a placeholder file can have. Retrieve this value through the System.FilePlaceholderStatus (PKEY_FilePlaceholderStatus) property.

member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES.PS_NONE
member.summary: None of the other states apply at this time.

member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES.PS_MARKED_FOR_OFFLINE_AVAILABILITY
member.summary: May already be or eventually will be available offline.

member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES.PS_FULL_PRIMARY_STREAM_AVAILABLE
member.summary: The primary stream has been made fully available.

member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES.PS_CREATE_FILE_ACCESSIBLE
member.summary: The file is accessible through a call to the function, without requesting the opening of reparse points.

member.name: PLACEHOLDER_STATES.PS_ALL
member.summary: A bitmask value for all valid PLACEHOLDER_STATES flags.
